name: Monster Hunter(Contraband Entertainment)
description:
Monster Hunter(Contraband Entertainment) is an arcade game developed by Contraband Entertainment. It was originally released in 2000. Monkey Byte Development published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Monster Hunter(Contraband Entertainment) is available on PC.
It was produced by Kenji Itsuno and Tsuyoshi Tanaka. It was directed by Kaname Fujioka. It was scored by Masato Kouda and Tetsuya Shibata.
